posts.text:
I am so damn proud of the IDF. ü•∞
Now that we're on the topic of pride, I am so proud to be a Zionist and a Jew. üáÆüá±
I am so proud that we are now, after 2,000 years of persecution, able to defend ourselves. üí™
I am so proud that we do that at the highest level of morality. We‚Ä¶

It occurred to me recently that despite the Jews finally being able to stand up for ourselves, so many Jews are still apologetic.
So many Jews prove that you can take a Jew out of exile but you can't take exile out of a Jew.
It is deeply saddening to me seeing Jews stand up for‚Ä¶

Spot on.
HT @soveryisraeli
posts.imageCaption: Gazalighting, verb. Psychological manipulation where one who commits atrocities uses the response to gain sympathy for their actions. Example: Bob kidnapped a baby and then complained when he was arrested. Bob is gazalighting.

posts.text:
Whistleblower exposes Amazon for rampant Antisemitism on Internal Communications Channels - The Jewish Legal News
Oh boy this is escalating quickly. How do we get Amazon senior management to pay attention? @Werner, can you please help?

**How the world got it all backward.**
The lie: ‚ÄúIsrael is committing genocide.‚Äù
The truth: Hamas, that was elected by the Palestinian people and have 80% support in Gaza are a genocidal organization that would kill every Jew and then every ‚Äúinfidel‚Äù if it could.
The lie:‚Ä¶

Here's all you need to know.
When Israel loses a soldier or civilian, they are heartbroken.
When Hamas loses a ‚Äúsoldier‚Äù or civilian, they are proud.
Israel glorifies life.
Hamas glorifies death...

Hamas and all its supporters before October 7th: ‚ÄúGaza is an air prison!! Poverty there is off the charts. Israel is preventing any goods from reaching all those innocent people! It's hell!‚Äù
Hamas and all its supporters after October 7th: ‚ÄúLook what the IDF did! ...

Are we still perpetuating the whole ‚ÄúAnti Zionism isn't antisemitism‚Äù lie or are we past that? Asking for a friend.
I mean, now that every Jew, whether they've ever stepped foot in Israel or not, is being attacked on the internet with 'free Palestine' comments and messages,‚Ä¶

Initial reports of a massive explosion in Beirut. My sources are telling me it's an IDF assassination of a senior Hamas leader.
Please Hashem, let it be true. üáÆüá±üí™

quote.text: Can you imagine if 20,000 people died on 9/11? And the whole world tried to tell Americans it didn't happen? Generations of Americans in trauma being told that their pain is not justified?
quote.author: Eve Barlow

posts.text:

Highly deeply disturbing.

posts.text:
Dear fellow journalists,
You have more responsibility right now than you've ever had before. Your keyboard is now a weapon that can bring death and destruction, or if used properly, can bring moral clarity and hope.
Choose wisely.
Agreed.

quote.text: It still astonishes me that Israel is allowing humanitarian aid into Gaza despite the fact that Hamas continues to hold over 100 Israeli hostages. And many Gazan "civilians" played a role in the kidnapping of these hostages.
quote.author: Natsecjeff

posts.text:
100 days for the hostages, but also 100 days for the Jews.
100 days of disappointment.
100 days of sadness.
100 days of prayer.
100 days of deep shock.
100 days of mourning.
100 days of questions.
100 days of confusion.
100 days of loneliness...

You know what would make me profoundly happy?
If Israel changed it from the IDF to the IOF.
No more Israel Defense Forces. We should move to Israel Offense Forces.
I wish Israel would stop being reactive and start being proactive.
I wish Israel would do what it needs to‚Ä¶
This is how they should be treated everywhere.

posts.text:
‚ÄúOMG, we don't have Internet!‚Äù
‚ÄúOMG, we don't have fuel to fire more rockets!‚Äù
‚ÄúOMG, we have no more water pipes to use as rockets!‚Äù
‚ÄúOMG, we don't have electricity to enable more terror!‚Äù
Did you hear that?

It makes zero sense that the IDF is risking its own soldiers in order to minimize the risk to Palestinians.
Never heard of such a thing and no other army would do this.
We are the most moral army in the world, but I'm sorry to say, this behavior is IMmoral.
It has to stop!
The beautiful country we are fighting for, and what Gaza could have looked like if only‚Ä¶
